About

Hi, I’m Gavin! I’m a law student at Washington University in St. Louis.

I strive for excellence. I was ranked the #1 rookie bridge player in North America in 2012. After earning a perfect score on the Law School Admissions Test, I taught hundreds of others to acheive their best — to rave reviews. Now, I’m excited to be looking towards the start of my legal career.

Projects

Russell

I spoke at RubyConf on logic programming, and wrote a demo framework based on cKanren [PDF].

You can check out my code here.

Interests

  • Wildnerness Backpacking — I spent a few weeks solo thru-hiking the Benton MacKaye Trail in the southeastern US
  • Cooking and cocktails — get in touch if you’d like an invitation to my next potluck!
  • Sailing — always willing to crew
